detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_read_conf_hash_parameter: read the configuration for the hash in Cache_inode layer.
Reads the configuration for the hash in Cache_inode layer.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS if ok, CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND is stanza is not there, CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_read_conf_client_parameter: read the configuration for a client to Cache inode layer.
Reads the configuration for a client to Cache inode layer (typically a worker thread).

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS if ok, CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND is stanza is not there, CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_read_conf_gc_policy: read the garbagge collection policy in configuration file.
Reads the garbagge collection policy in configuration file.

simplesect.para: CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS if ok, CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND is stanza is not there, CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_print_conf_gc_policy: prints the garbagge collection policy.
Prints the garbagge collection policy in configuration file.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] a descriptor to the IO for printing the data.
[IN] a descriptor to the IO for printing the data.

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_print_gc_pol: prints the garbagge collection policy.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] a descriptor to the IO for printing the data.

briefdescription.para: Read the configuration file for the Cache inode initialization.
